entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 40 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over exposed areas. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 40%
